amendment.description: To ensure the continuation of benefits for certain individuals providing security services for Federal buildings.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 3629 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 49 - 45. Record Vote Number: 177.

Amendment SA 3629 proposed by Senator Dayton. (consideration: CR S9117-9119; text: CR S9118) To ensure the continuation of benefits for certain individuals providing security services for Federal buildings.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 3629 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 49 - 45. Record Vote Number: 177.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3629 proposed by Senator Dayton.
